SEARCH
Package com.digitizer.core

Class ColorUtils

java.lang.Object
com.digitizer.core.ColorUtils
public final class ColorUtils extends Object
Utility class for color operations including hex parsing, RGB distance, and blending. This class is used by image processing code such as AutoTracer to compare pixel colors to a dataset color.

All helper methods are static and the class is not instantiable.

  • Method Details

    • hexToColor

      public static javafx.scene.paint.Color hexToColor(String hex)
      Parses a hex color string to a JavaFX Color. Supports formats: "#RRGGBB", "RRGGBB", "#RGB", "RGB"
      Parameters:
      hex - the hex color string
      Returns:
      the parsed Color, or Color.BLACK if parsing fails

    • colorToHex

      public static String colorToHex(javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Converts a JavaFX Color to a hex string.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to convert
      Returns:
      hex string in format "#RRGGBB"

    • colorDistance

      public static double colorDistance(double r1, double g1, double b1, double r2, double g2, double b2)
      Calculates the Euclidean distance between two RGB colors. Each component is expected to be in the range [0, 1].
      Parameters:
      r1 - red component of first color
      g1 - green component of first color
      b1 - blue component of first color
      r2 - red component of second color
      g2 - green component of second color
      b2 - blue component of second color
      Returns:
      Euclidean distance in RGB space

    • colorDistance

      public static double colorDistance(javafx.scene.paint.Color color1, javafx.scene.paint.Color color2)
      Calculates the Euclidean distance between two JavaFX Color objects.
      Parameters:
      color1 - first color
      color2 - second color
      Returns:
      Euclidean distance in RGB space

    • blendColors

      public static javafx.scene.paint.Color blendColors(javafx.scene.paint.Color color1, javafx.scene.paint.Color color2, double t)
      Blends two colors together using linear interpolation.
      Parameters:
      color1 - first color
      color2 - second color
      t - blending factor (0.0 = color1, 1.0 = color2)
      Returns:
      the blended color

    • normalizeHex

      public static String normalizeHex(String hex)
      Helper to ensure a hex color is normalized and returned as a 6-character hex string preceded by '#'. If the input is shorthand ("RGB") it will be expanded. Returns "#000000" on error.
      Parameters:
      hex - input color string, may be null
      Returns:
      normalized hex string like "#RRGGBB"
